Name: Alien Marauder
About the game: In the future, the entire humanity are facing the shortage of energy. As a commander of the space expeditionary force, you have to build frontier mining bases across the galaxy, gather different kinds of resources, and survive constant attacks of vexans. Level up your heroes and upgrade your buildings. Fight off the vexan with properly built strategies and fortifications. If a Real-Time-Strategy & Survival Hybrid is too much for you, don’t worry： Use the pause button to think twice. Throw yourself into various hostile exterrestial environments, collect different kinds of resourses to bring properity to your base, fend off different kinds of fiendish alien beings--vexans with your well- arranged fortification! Challenge yourself by diving right into countless vexans, gather mercenaries to defend your improvisional base from vexan onslaughts, and ugrade them with mysterious chips, make your army deadly and different every time! Find your own best build to survive it all! The game has two different modes: Survival and Last Stand. In each mode, you can choose between two heroes with different setups. For certain heroes, there would be even NO WALLS! Anyway, here’s one for those who seek survival: more researches means better chances, simple&easy.
